pr_title: Allow type inclusion of non-abstract objects

timeline.message: Fix object type inclusion bstring unit test cases
Fix existing test for non abstract obj inclusion
Fix existing test for non abstract obj inclusion

timeline.bodyText: When you replace, ArrayList with a HashSet, you lose the insertion order. That may cause intermittent test failures. Better option is to replace it with a LinkedHashSet.
timeline.author: hasithaa

replies.bodyText:
